# TimeSpanResponse.FromException method

Creates a new [`TimeSpanResponse`](../TimeSpanResponse.md) instance from known exception.

```csharp
public static TimeSpanResponse FromException(Exception exception)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| exception | Target exception. |

## Return Value

A new [`TimeSpanResponse`](../TimeSpanResponse.md) instance for specified exception.
